via LinkQuery on table COCO by program GB306

on 13.12.2005 WJ SCR9731 change parameter and where condition

ExpSyntax.val: 'and '&Trim (Str ({0,1},'11'))&' <= (select cast (sum ('&IF ({0,2}={1,9},'a.DEBC_CREDITLIMITH','a.DEBC_FINANCELIMITH')&') as decimal (11,0)) from '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/debc a where a.debc_debh = debh_no)'
MlsTrans ('SCR[ODH110]: List with largest maximal limits')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select DEBH_NO, DEBH_HADR_NAME1, DEBH_HADR_CITY, DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY from :1/DEBH, :1/DEBC, :1/CLNT where DEBC_DEBH = DEBH_NO and CLNT101_ADMNO = DEBC_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO = DEBC_CLNTNO and DEBC_DATDELETED is null and DEBH_DATDELETED is null and CLNT203_OFFICE = ':2' :3 order by DEBH_NO

ExpSyntax.val: IF ({3,2}={1,9},'Debtors with actual credit limit > '&Trim (Str ({3,1},'N11C')),'Debtors with actual finance limit > '&Trim (Str ({3,1},'N11C')))

MlsTrans ('DEBTOR NUMBER')&{0,12}&MlsTrans ('DEBTOR NAME')&{0,12}&MlsTrans ('DEBTOR CITY')&{0,12}&MlsTrans ('DEBTOR COUNTRY')&{0,12}&MlsTrans ('ACTUAL LIMITS')&{0,12}&MlsTrans ('FINANCED AMOUNT')&{0,12}&MlsTrans ('TOTAL AMOUNT')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum (DEBC_CREDITLIMITH) as decimal (11,0)), cast (sum (DEBC_FINANCELIMITH) as decimal (11,0)) from :1/DEBC where DEBC_DEBH = :2
